main.name: Manav Mendiratta
main.description: I recently graduated from the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and am currently employed with Target
main.bio: I'm a recent 22 year-old college graduate. I describe myself as someone who is passionate about learning and trying new things, while also not being afraid to inquire about things I don't understand. I grew up playing sports my whole life such as basketball, soccer, and golf, which has led me to become an avid Minnesota sports fan. I aspire to travel and see as much of the world as I can in my life.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
